```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(sqldf)
require(xtable)
```

```{r load}
ds <- read.csv("../results/execution-time.csv", head=T, sep=',')

tools <- sqldf("select tool as Tool, project as Project, avg(time/1000) as Time 
                from ds 
                group by tool, project")

xtable(tools)


boxplot(tools$Time~tools$Tool)


summary(tools[tools$Tool == 'cc',])

summary(tools[tools$Tool == 'cg',])

```
